parts.text: {"word":"activated","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(機械・装置など)を作動させる、起動する","english_definition":"to make something active or operative.","examples":[{"sentence":"The alarm is activated by pressing this button.","translation":"このボタンを押すとアラームが作動します。"},{"sentence":"The sensor activates the light when someone approaches.","translation":"人が近づくとセンサーがライトを点灯させます。"},{"sentence":"The emergency brake is activated automatically.","translation":"非常ブレーキは自動的に作動します。"}],"collocations":["activate a device (装置を作動させる)","activate a system (システムを起動する)","activate an alarm (アラームを作動させる)","activate a program (プログラムを起動する)","activate a feature (機能を有効にする)"],"synonyms":["start","initiate","trigger","enable","set off","turn on"],"antonyms":["deactivate","disable","turn off"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(化学物質・細胞など)を活性化する、活性化させる","english_definition":"":"to make something chemically reactive or biologically active.","examples":[{"sentence":"The enzyme is activated by a specific protein.","translation":"その酵素は特定のタンパク質によって活性化されます。"},{"sentence":"The drug activates the immune system.","translation":"その薬は免疫系を活性化します。"},{"sentence":"Sunlight activates vitamin D in the skin.","translation":"日光は皮膚のビタミンDを活性化します。"}],"collocations":["activate an enzyme (酵素を活性化する)","activate a cell (細胞を活性化する)","activate a chemical (化学物質を活性化する)","activate the immune system (免疫系を活性化する)"],"synonyms":["stimulate","energize","catalyze","potentiate","sensitize"],"antonyms":["inhibit","deactivate"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(組織・グループなど)を活動化する、活発化させる","english_definition":"to make something more active or effective.","examples":[{"sentence":"The new policy activated the local economy.","translation":"新しい政策は地域経済を活性化させました。"},{"sentence":"The campaign activated a large number of volunteers.","translation":"そのキャンペーンは多数のボランティアを活動化させました。"},{"sentence":"The project aims to activate community participation.","translation":"そのプロジェクトは地域社会の参加を活発化させることを目指しています。"}],"collocations":["activate an organization (組織を活動化する)","activate a community (地域社会を活発化する)","activate a movement (運動を活発化する)"],"synonyms":["mobilize","energize","stimulate","motivate","galvanize"],"antonyms":["stifle","suppress","inhibit"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(アカウント・カードなど)を有効にする、使用可能にする","english_definition":"to make an account, card, etc. able to be used.","examples":[{"sentence":"You need to activate your credit card before using it.","translation":"クレジットカードを使用する前に有効にする必要があります。"},{"sentence":"Please activate your account by clicking the link in the email.","translation":"メール内のリンクをクリックしてアカウントを有効にしてください。"},{"sentence":"The service will be activated within 24 hours.","translation":"サービスは24時間以内に有効になります。"}],"collocations":["activate an account (アカウントを有効にする)","activate a card (カードを有効にする)","activate a service (サービスを有効にする)"],"synonyms":["enable","validate","authorize"],"antonyms":["deactivate","disable","invalidate"]}],"etymology":{"value":"From 'active' + '-ate' + '-ed'. 'Active' comes from Latin 'activus', meaning 'capable of action'. The suffix '-ate' is used to form verbs, meaning 'to make'. '-ed' is the past participle suffix.","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˈæktɪveɪtɪd/","syllables":"ac-ti-vat-ed"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["activate","activates"],"past_simple":"activated","past_participle":"activated","present_participle":"activating"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Activate' generally means to make something capable of functioning or to set it in motion. It can apply to physical devices, chemical processes, organizational efforts, or digital accounts. The specific meaning depends heavily on the context.","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ The button is activating.","correct":"✓ The button activates the machine.","note":"'Activate' is a transitive verb, so it requires a direct object. 'The button is activating' is grammatically incorrect unless it's part of a passive construction like 'The button is being activated'."},{"incorrect":"✗ I activated my account with my phone.","correct":"✓ I activated my account on my phone.","note":"When referring to using a device to activate something online, use 'on' rather than 'with'."}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["activation (noun)","activator (noun)","active (adjective)"],"phrasal_verbs":[]},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"Relatively frequent.","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"'Activated' means something has been made able to work or has been started. It's used for machines, chemicals, and even things like accounts on websites. It's a bit more formal than just saying 'started' or 'turned on'. You'll often see it in instructions or explanations about how things work."},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The remote control **activated** the television.","translation":"リモコンがテレビを作動させました。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"作動させる"},{"sentence":"The catalyst **activated** the chemical reaction.","translation":"触媒が化学反応を活性化しました。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"活性化する"},{"sentence":"The community leader **activated** the neighborhood watch program.","translation":"地域リーダーが地域見守り活動プログラムを活動化させました。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"活動化する"},{"sentence":"I **activated** my new phone online.","translation":"私はオンラインで新しい携帯電話を有効にしました。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"有効にする"}]}
